cpb_vouchers_add_credit_info: Choose the amount (excl. GST) to be credited for this project. Once the purchase order has been settled, this credit will be used for bills and project usage invoiced over the following 12 months.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_amount: Amount to credit ( excl. GST {{ currency }} ):
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_required_error: You need to enter an amount to be credited to your account.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_max_error: This is not a valid amount.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_error: Oops... An error has occurred while purchasing Public Cloud credit.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_success: The purchase order for your {{ amount }} credit, is available here.
cpb_vouchers_add_credit_load_err: Oups, une erreur est survenue lors du chargement de l’achat de crédit cloud.
